calculations.name: Carry mod
calculations.tableau_expression:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    (if [Max Date]= [RpDate] then 
IF [R/Rr (group)]="Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)])*-1 
ELSEIF [R/Rr (group)]="Reverse Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)]) END

 else 0 END)
else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then 

IF [R/Rr (group)]="Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)])*-1 
ELSEIF [R/Rr (group)]="Reverse Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)]) END
 else 0 END END

else if [RpDate]= [Parameters].[End Date] then 

IF [R/Rr (group)]="Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)])*-1 
ELSEIF [R/Rr (group)]="Reverse Repo" THEN ABS([Carry (in CAD)]) END
 else 0 END END

calculated_fields.Max Date:
case datepart('weekday',today())
    when 1 then today()-2
    when 2 then today()-3
    else today()-1
    END
